name: Echo of Spirit
description:
Enclosed Survival Horror.

Story

You trapped in a room with many buttons and panels, and something is approaching you from the distance. Can you hold them down until the times run out?

Controls

- WASD to Move.

- Mouse to Look Around.

- Left Mouse Button to Interact.

- Right Mouse Button to Turn On / Off Flashlight.

How to Play

- Use button to control and shoot the spirits outside.

- Use flashlight to see the spirits color, careful don't turn the light on too long.

- Don't pressed button with no spirit of the same color outside, you'll be haunted.

- If you die keep going, something will help you.

- Try to survive until the time reaches zero.

Install

Download, unzip, and play, or play the browser version.

Information

Hi there, thank you so much to come here and try my game, this is my third game for game jam. I'm pretty happy how this game turns out to be, and will be happier if you enjoy it too. Feedback is very much appreciated.
